description.value:
[Addictive] Gain Frenzy Talent and Immunity to Fear for 1d10 Minutes

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: 95 T
description.summary: [Addictive] Gain Frenzy Talent and Immunity to Fear for 1d10 Minutes
